clue: Quietly disconnected from phones, leading to time that's free of artifice
explanation: Quietly = P ("piano"), disconnected from PHONES, to give HONES. HONES leading to time (T) is HONEST. Free of artifice.
hints: In cryptics, "time" can be represented by the letter T.
There is a single letter that can represent "quietly". Consider music notation...
That letter should be disconnected (removed) from PHONES.
